author: kangman
body: can you put in the osx alpha 9 artifact in releases?

comments.author: kangman
comments.body: the link is not there in your first URL.

comments.author: alexandair
comments.body: I don't understand. powershell-6.0.0-alpha.9.pkg is the third entry in that list.

comments.author: kangman
comments.body: sorry didn't know pkg extension was for OSX in particular.  as the previous release name had OSX within the file name.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @kangman Yeah, adding the .NET Core RID to the end of the package names was done by me, and technically incorrect, so I removed them. The [Get PowerShell matrix](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell#get-powershell) should direct you to the correct package for your platform.

title: alpha 9 for osx in releases
